title: Kryddlegin Hjortu
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Soup and salad bar with a plenitude of vegan items, including two soups, bean and grain salads, fruit and veggies. Ask about vegan dressings. Fresh bread with hummus and sun-dried-tomato pesto always on offer. Has lunch specials. The other branch at Skulagata 17 reported shuts down Sept 2014.
